author: Joe Concha
title: Laurence Tribe roasted for advocating herd immunity on coronavirus: 'You go first'
description: Harvard Law School Professor Laurence Tribe faced blowback on social media Friday after advocating that a large portion of the population will "need to be exposed" and die from coronavirus in order to put an end to the cr...
content:
Harvard Law School Professor Laurence Tribe faced blowback on social media Friday after advocating that a large portion of the population will need to be exposed and die from coronavirus in order to put an end to the crisis.
Because its too late to contain C… [+1860 chars]
